channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: George Santos says he’s humbled but dismisses ‘pearl clutching’ critics
item.description: Freed from the prison where he had been serving time for ripping off his campaign donors, former U.S. Rep. George Santos says he’s humbled by his experience behind bars.

item.title: California police say shrapnel hits and damages a patrol vehicle during Marine Corps drills
Trump administration to defend Alina Habba’s tenure as top New Jersey prosecutor
